Name: HMS Misoa
Motto:
Latin: Veni, vidi, vici 
(English: "I came, I saw, I conquered")
Draught:
Fully laden :
15 ft (4.6 m) aft
4 ft (1.2 m) forward
Capacity: 18 × 30-ton tanks or 22 × 25-ton tanks or 33 heavy trucks
Armament:
1 × single (from early 1944, twin) QF 2 pounder naval gun(s)
6 × single Oerlikon 20 mm cannon
3 × Lewis guns
Smoke mortar
